nodes.text: Sneeve was the homeworld of the Sneevel species. It was located in the Kastolar sector of the Mid Rim.
Sneeve was discovered by Duros explorers circa 14,000 BBY. The planet later joined the Galactic Republic.

During the Separatist Crisis, the planet was represented in the Galactic Senate by Jollin Resbin. It allowed Refugee Relief Movement settlement in 22 BBY, prior to the Clone Wars. When the Clone Wars broke out, the planet was located within Separatist space.

Later, the Galactic Empire tried to prevent the Sneevels from traveling off-system, but the Sneevels felt a greater need to do so because of their prohibition. The Empire appointed a governor to rule Sneeve, but this measure proved to be ineffective, as many Sneevels answered the oppression by joining the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
Sneevel was the homeworld of podracer pilot Boles Roor.

Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Episode I and Alien Anthology place Sneeve in the Expansion Region, while later sources such as Star Wars Insider 65 and the website HoloNet News locate it in the Mid Rim.
